data.name: The Masters: Survival Demo
data.detailed_description:
Tana (Katana) is testing the new Virtual Proxy Simulation, which is going to be used for training at a school for elementals, as she fights the evil creatures known as the Shadow Dwellers. She is being helped by her Family and Friends who are outside of the system making sure the simulation goes well. All is not what it seems however as she dives deeper into the system and faces off against an old foe, Master Nether.

This is the Beta demo version that includes the tutorial portion of the story mode and survival mode. top-down, hack n' slash, survival game, using Unreal Engine 4. As you progress through each level surviving against waive after waive of enemies called Shadow Dwellers. You have special powers and can summon a companion NPC. There is also one on one boss fights, a survival mode where you survive as long as possible, and rack up a score.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 7
  • Processor: 4th Gen Intel Core i7-4790 processor, or Equivalent
  • Memory: 4 MB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 760 graphics, or Equivalent
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 704 MB available space
  • Sound Card: n/a
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: AMD FX 8350 Eigth-Core Processor, 4000 Mhz, , or Equivalent
  • Memory: 8 MB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 970 graphics, or Equivalent
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Storage: 704 MB available space
  • Sound Card: n/a

content_descriptors.notes: Sword fighting and some minor cursing.
